text:
e="preserve">Captain Qwark is a main character of the "Ratchet & Clank" franchise. He is an intergalactic superhero who becomes an enemy to Ratchet and Clank in both "Ratchet & Clank" and '. He reformed in ' and became a cowardly hero since then.
Biography.
Copernicus Leslie Qwark has been known for being a savior of the Solana Galaxy. He has defeated Dr. Nefarious and other galactic villains. He was hired by Ultimate Supreme Executive Chairman Alonzo Drek to help him build the Deplanetizer.
Actors.
Jim Ward has voiced Qwark since his first appearance.
Reception.
People loved Qwark as a villain in the first two games but didn't like him as a cowardly hero since the third game.
